text: <@U02ABPZRT2N> I took the opposite approach. My PHP package is the goto in that community with more checkouts from github more than all the other PHP equivalents put together, but 2 years ago I concluded that it was worth learning Python just for betfairlightweight and Pandas. And then Flumine came along to confirm that I'd made the choice (at least for me).
